example[0]: The old machine used to make an awful racket.
definition[1]: a dishonest way of obtaining money, such as by threatening people or selling them illegal goods
example[1]: Police believe he is involved in an international smuggling racket.
definition[2]: a specially shaped piece of wood or metal that you use for hitting the ball in games such as tennis, that has a circle filled with tight strings at one end
definition[3]: a dishonest or illegal way of obtaining money
example[3]: He had used his position to set up a cocaine racket.
